name: Smart Edu Universty Portal Website
description: Basic university website with MERN and CRUD operations. Mongo db for database, EJS for template engine. This web site includes 3 role (Student, Teacher, Admin). Courses can be created (by teacher and admin). Categories, Courses and Users can be modify by admin. Students can add lessons to their dashboard
deps: Express, Mongoose, Mongo DB, EJS, Slugify, Bcrypt, Dotenv, Express-session, Express-validator, Connect-flash, Connect-mongo, Method-override, Nodemailer, Nodemon(as Dev)

name: Responsive Weather App Website
description: Basic weather web application with context api and axios.

name: Responsive E-commerce Website
description: An E-Commerce website, including login and (fake) registration, without ordering.
deps: Axios, React Router, Formik, YUP, React ICONS

name: Clean Blog  Website
description: A blog website trial (ready for  heroku)
